name: Shoot The Hoop
description:
Hey Hoopers! Welcome to my basketball mobile game!

This crazy basketball game challenges you to shoot all the balls on the court before time runs out. Wait shooting star! Avoid the obstacles on the track and pay attention to the colors.

This prototype was made in unity to demonstrate the basic techniques for creating compulsion loops and their ethical design alternatives. If you want to know more you can contact its creator and access his research work by email (angel.basquet@gmail.com)

Game available for PC WINDOWS & MOBILE ANDROID.

Mobile download: 

You can directly download the APK to your mobile from the download option --> ShootTheHoop_MegaMike.apk

Download pc windows: 

Download the ZIP (Build Windows.zip) from the download option. Unzip the file and run the ShootTheHoop application.

DON'T WORRY! There is no virus ;).

Creator: MEGAMIKE
